parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The name of the database account.

parameters.name: AccountPassword
parameters.description: The password of the database account.

parameters.name: FullPlan
parameters.description:
The policy for full backup. The value of this parameter is a JSON string that contains the following fields:

*   **start**: the start time of a backup task
*   **interval**: the interval of backup tasks
*   **type**: the unit of the interval
*   **days**: the days of a week on which a backup task is performed

parameters.name: IncPlan
parameters.description:
The policy for incremental backup. The value of this parameter is a JSON string that contains the following fields:

*   **start**: the start time of a backup task
*   **interval**: the interval of backup tasks
*   **type**: the unit of the interval
*   **days**: the days of a week on which a backup task is performed

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description:
The ID of the anti-ransomware policy.

> You can call the [DescribeUniBackupPolicies](~~DescribeUniBackupPolicies~~) operation to query the IDs of anti-ransomware policies.

parameters.name: PolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the anti-ransomware policy.

parameters.name: PolicyStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the anti-ransomware policy. Valid values:

*   **enabled**
*   **disabled**

parameters.name: Retention
parameters.description: The retention period of the backup snapshot.

parameters.name: SpeedLimiter
parameters.description: The maximum network bandwidth that is allowed during data backup. Unit: bytes.
